name: GuessThePicture
0:
”Alexa open guess the picture”
”Alexa play guess the picture”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guess the picture
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Guess The Picture is a picture guessing game against the clock!

You're up against a 2-minute timer, with a picture hidden beneath disappearing tiles. Each tile you lose reveals a part of the picture - your task is to guess what it is before time runs out!

With more than 10 categories of pictures to guess from, each round is a fresh and exciting challenge. Be careful though - three incorrect guesses or a zero on the clock, and it's game over!

Push your limits and aim to beat your own high score. Whether you're a quick thinker or a keen observer, this game is perfect for testing your guessing game. So, are you ready to put your picture-guessing skills to the test? Let's see how many pictures you can conquer before the buzzer!

This skill is only supported on Echo Show and Fire TV Devices.

HUGO FM
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
